charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 71 months as to count one and 84 months as to count two. Count two will run consecutive to count one. Additionally, this sentence will run consecutively to the sentence imposed in the Middle District of Florida, docket number 8:01cr56 T 30 TBM. The Court recommends to the Bureau of Prisons: It is the recommendation of the Court that while in the custody of the Bureau of Prisons, the defendant be allowed to participate in available mental health programs. The defendant is remanded t o the custody of the US Marshal. The defendant was denied bond and has remained in the custody of the US Marshal until sentencing. Supervised Release: 60 months as to each count to run concurrent with each other; Special Monetary Assessment: $20 0.00; Restitution: $9,458.00 is hereby ordered jointly and severally with co-defendants Robert Howe and John Holzer. The defendant shall forfeit his interest in the following property to the United States: 1) Smith and Wesson Model 10 .38 Specia l Revolver (SN: D136832); 2) Winchester Model 94 Rifle .30-30 caliber (SN: 1872703); 3) FN 12 Gauge sawed-off shotgun (SN: 165362)

Imprisonment: 71 months as to count one and 84 months as to count two. Count two will run consecutive to count one. Additionally, this sentence will run consecutively to the sentence imposed in the Middle District of Florida, docket number 8:01cr56 T 30 TBM. The defendant is remanded t o the custody of the US Marshal. The defendant was denied bond and has remained in the custody of the US Marshal until sentencing. Supervised Release: 60 months as to each count to run concurrent with each other; Special Monetary Assessment: $20 0.00; Restitution: $9,458.00 is hereby ordered jointly and severally with co-defendants Robert Howe and John Holzer. The defendant shall forfeit his interest in the following property to the United States: 1) Smith and Wesson Model 10 .38 Specia l Revolver (SN: D136832); 2) Winchester Model 94 Rifle .30-30 caliber (SN: 1872703); 3) FN 12 Gauge sawed-off shotgun (SN: 165362)
